text: Ciudad Obregón () is the second largest city in the northern Mexican state of Sonora. It is located south of the state's northern border with the U.S. state of Arizona. ==Twin towns — Sister cities== Ciudad Obregón is twinned with: * Baton Rouge, Louisiana, United States, since 1977 * Tucson, Arizona, United States, since 1980 ==References== Category:Cities in Mexico Category:Settlements in Sonora
title: Ciudad Obregón
